SCALAR.name: Upload
SCALAR.description: The `Upload` scalar type represents a file upload.

SCALAR.name: String
SCALAR.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

SCALAR.name: Int
SCALAR.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

SCALAR.name: ID
SCALAR.description: The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"4"`) or integer (such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

SCALAR.name: Long
SCALAR.description: The `Long` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole 64-bit numeric values. Long can represent values between -(2^63) and 2^63 - 1.

SCALAR.name: DateTime
SCALAR.description: The `DateTime` scalar represents an ISO-8601 compliant date time type.

SCALAR.name: Float
SCALAR.description: The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

SCALAR.name: EmailAddress
SCALAR.description: The EmailAddress scalar type constitutes a valid email address, represented as a UTF-8 character sequence. The scalar follows the specification defined by the HTML Spec https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/input.html#valid-e-mail-address.

OBJECT.name: CheckoutCustomer
OBJECT.description: Represents a customer node in the checkout.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email address of the customer.

fields.name: checkingAccountActive
fields.description: Indicates if the checking account is being used.

fields.name: completed
fields.description: Indicates if the checkout is completed.

fields.name: couponDiscount
fields.description: The total coupon discount applied at checkout.

fields.name: customer
fields.description: The customer associated with the checkout.

fields.name: customizationValue
fields.description: The total value of customizations added to the products.

fields.name: discount
fields.description: The discount applied at checkout excluding any coupons.

fields.name: kits
fields.description: A list of kits associated with the checkout.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: The metadata related to this checkout.

fields.name: minimumRequirements
fields.description: Indicates the minimum requirements for completing the checkout.

fields.name: paymentFees
fields.description: The additional fees applied based on the payment method.

fields.name: products
fields.description: A list of products associated with the checkout.

fields.name: selectedAddress
fields.description: The selected delivery address for the checkout.

fields.name: totalDiscount
fields.description: The total discount applied at checkout.

fields.name: url
fields.description: Url for the current checkout id.

OBJECT.name: CheckoutOrder
OBJECT.description: Represents a node in the checkout order.

fields.name: adjustments
fields.description: The list of adjustments applied to the order.

fields.name: delivery
fields.description: Details of the delivery or store pickup.

fields.name: discountValue
fields.description: The discount value of the order.

fields.name: dispatchTimeText
fields.description: The dispatch time text from the shop settings.

fields.name: interestValue
fields.description: The interest value of the order.

fields.name: products
fields.description: The list of products in the order.

fields.name: shippingValue
fields.description: The shipping value of the order.

fields.name: totalValue
fields.description: The total value of the order.

OBJECT.name: ShippingQuoteGroup
OBJECT.description: A shipping quote group.

fields.name: pickups
fields.description: List of available pickup shipping quotes.

fields.name: products
fields.description: The products related to the shipping quote group.

OBJECT.name: PickupShippingQuote
OBJECT.description: The pickup shipping quote.

OBJECT.name: Customer
OBJECT.description: A customer from the store.

fields.name: customerType
fields.description: Indicates if it is a natural person or company profile.

fields.name: order
fields.description: A specific order placed by the customer.

fields.name: orders
fields.description: List of orders placed by the customer.

fields.name: ordersStatistics
fields.description: Statistics about the orders the customer made in a specific timeframe.

fields.name: partners
fields.description: Get info about the associated partners.

fields.name: checkingAccount
fields.description: Checking account value used for the order.

fields.name: date
fields.description: The date when te order was placed.

fields.name: deliveryAddress
fields.description: The address where the order will be delivered.

fields.name: kits
fields.description: A list of kits belonging to the order.

fields.name: paymentDate
fields.description: The date when the order was payed.

fields.name: promotions
fields.description: List of promotions applied to the order.

fields.name: statusHistory
fields.description: List of the order status history.

fields.name: cancellationDate
fields.description: The date when the subscription was cancelled.

fields.name: coupon
fields.description: The coupon code applied to the subscription.

fields.name: intercalatedRecurrenceDate
fields.description: The date of intercalated recurring payments.

fields.name: nextRecurrenceDate
fields.description: The date of the next recurring payment.

fields.name: pauseDate
fields.description: The date when the subscription was paused.

fields.name: payment
fields.description: The payment details for the subscription.

fields.name: products
fields.description: The list of products associated with the subscription.

fields.name: recurring
fields.description: The details of the recurring subscription.

OBJECT.name: Hotsite
OBJECT.description: A hotsite is a group of products used to organize them or to make them easier to browse.

fields.name: banners
fields.description: A list of banners associated with the hotsite.

fields.name: contents
fields.description: A list of contents associated with the hotsite.

fields.name: endDate
fields.description: The hotsite will be displayed until this date.

fields.name: expression
fields.description: Expression used to associate products to the hotsite.

fields.name: pageSize
fields.description: Set the quantity of products displayed per page.

fields.name: products
fields.description: A list of products associated with the hotsite.

fields.name: sorting
fields.description: Sorting information to be used by default on the hotsite.

fields.name: startDate
fields.description: The hotsite will be displayed from this date.

fields.name: template
fields.description: The template used for the hotsite.

OBJECT.name: Search

fields.description: A list of banners displayed in search pages.

fields.name: pageSize
fields.description: The quantity of products displayed per page.

fields.description: An offset based paginated list of products from the search.

fields.name: searchTime
fields.description: Time taken to perform the search.

fields.name: maxLength

OBJECT.name: ProductsConnection
OBJECT.description: A connection to a list of items.

fields.name: nodes
fields.description: A flattened list of the nodes.

OBJECT.name: PageInfo
OBJECT.description: Information about pagination in a connection.

fields.name: endCursor
fields.description: When paginating forwards, the cursor to continue.

fields.name: hasNextPage
fields.description: Indicates whether more edges exist following the set defined by the clients arguments.

fields.name: hasPreviousPage
fields.description: Indicates whether more edges exist prior the set defined by the clients arguments.

fields.name: startCursor
fields.description: When paginating backwards, the cursor to continue.

OBJECT.name: ProductsEdge
OBJECT.description: An edge in a connection.

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: A cursor for use in pagination.

fields.name: node
fields.description: The item at the end of the edge.

fields.name: buyList
fields.description: Retrieve a buylist by the given id.

fields.name: checkout
fields.description: Get info from the checkout cart corresponding to the given ID.

fields.name: checkoutLite
fields.description: Retrieve essential checkout details for a specific cart.

fields.name: customer
fields.description: Get informations about a customer from the store.

fields.name: customerAccessTokenDetails
fields.description: Get informations about a customer access token.

fields.name: eventList
fields.description: Retrieve an event list by the token.

fields.name: eventLists
fields.description: Retrieves a list of store events.

fields.name: hotsite
fields.description: Retrieve a single hotsite. A hotsite consists of products, banners and contents.

fields.name: hotsites
fields.description: List of the shop's hotsites. A hotsite consists of products, banners and contents.

fields.name: paymentMethods
fields.description: Returns the available payment methods for a given cart ID

fields.name: product
fields.description: Retrieve a product by the given id.

fields.description: Retrieve a list of product recommendations based on the customer's cart.

fields.name: productAIRecommendationsByOrder
fields.description: Retrieve a list of product recommendations based on the customer's orders.

fields.name: productOptions
fields.description: Options available for the given product.

fields.name: productRecommendations
fields.description: Retrieve a list of recommended products by product id.

fields.name: products
fields.description: Retrieve a list of products by specific filters.

fields.name: shippingQuoteGroups
fields.description: Get the shipping quote groups by providing CEP and checkout or products.

fields.name: shippingQuotes
fields.description: Get the shipping quotes by providing CEP and checkout or product identifier.

fields.name: checkoutAddKit
fields.description: Add kit to an existing checkout

fields.description: Add products to an existing checkout

fields.name: checkoutAddressAssociate
fields.description: Associate the address with a checkout.

fields.description: Clones a cart by the given checkout ID, returns the newly created checkout ID

fields.description: Associate the customer with a checkout.

fields.description: Selects the variant of a gift product

fields.name: checkoutPartnerAssociate
fields.description: Associate the partner with a checkout.

fields.description: Disassociates the checkout from the partner and returns a new checkout.

fields.name: checkoutRemoveKit
fields.description: Remove kit from an existing checkout

fields.name: checkoutRemoveMetadata
fields.description: Removes metadata keys from a checkout

fields.name: checkoutRemoveProduct
fields.description: Remove products from an existing checkout

fields.name: checkoutReset
fields.description: Resets a specific area of a checkout

fields.name: checkoutUpdateProduct
fields.description: Update a product of an existing checkout

fields.name: createNewsletterRegister
fields.description: Register an email in the newsletter.

fields.name: createProductReview
fields.description: Adds a review to a product variant.

fields.name: createSearchTermRecord
fields.description: Record a searched term for admin reports

fields.name: customerAccessTokenCreate
fields.description: Creates a new customer access token with an expiration time.

fields.name: customerAccessTokenRenew
fields.description: Renews the expiration time of a customer access token. The token must not be expired.

fields.name: customerAddressRemove
fields.description: Delete an existing address, if it is not the only registered address

fields.name: customerAuthenticateAccessKey
fields.description: Authenticate using the provided email and access key.

fields.name: customerAuthenticatedLogin
fields.description: Creates a new customer access token with an expiration time.

fields.name: customerCompletePartialRegistration
fields.description: Allows the user to complete the required information for a partial registration.

fields.name: customerImpersonate
fields.description: Impersonates a customer, generating an access token with expiration time.

fields.name: customerPasswordRecovery
fields.description: Sends a password recovery email to the user.

fields.name: customerSendAccessKeyEmail
fields.description: Sends an email containing an access key for authentication.

fields.name: customerSimpleLoginStart
fields.description: Returns the user associated with a simple login (CPF or Email) if exists, else return a New user.

fields.name: customerSimpleLoginVerifyAnwser

fields.name: customerSocialLoginGoogle

fields.name: customerSubscriptionAddressChange
